# LeafProperty.ProcessorInfoAndFeatures.Features.VME property

Gets a value representing the key to retrieve the property value.

Virtual 8086 Mode Enhancements. A value of true indicates Virtual 8086 mode enhancements.

Key Composition

* Leaf: ProcessorInfoAndFeatures
* Property: VME
* Unit: None

Return Value

Type: Boolean
